column5: Got out last night after work off of Bronte, east wind came up in the PM and started to make things kinda lumpy out there. i think what they say about winds from the east fish bite the least. Most fish we spotted where in the 120 to 140 ft mark 40-65 down. Marked alot of fish but lock jaw for us for the first few hours. Here is the best bait we found, worked it over 4 times I would love to see what this looks like on an HD-8 in downscan.    Finally around 7:30pm after draggng spoons we switched to SD and a fly in chratruese with white fly we had this one hit.     Just a hair shy of 40 inches but slim, fought like a much bigger fish as he hugged the bottom and dogged it out.  My best king of the year but then again I have been hitting the blue zone for the last month.  but like a bonehead I forgot to take a picture with my tourney sign!!!!!!  DOHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH!!!!  Sorry team 4!  Darren
Nice King Darren. And thx for the detail. I have yet to land a salmon on the wire, dipsey, SD & fly. 100% off spoons. The wire set up is the hot producer for us in the BZ though.  Slayer P.RTRD

Where'd you launch. I've been taking a few weeks off to do some more work on the basement reno but can't do any more until I get some electrical work done. I guess it's back out on the lake a few nights a week.  Nice big tail. I haven't had a chinook fight deep for a long time - all come right up to the surface. Those deep fights are awesome
That's funny because we have had nothing hitting on the spoons, all on flies.
Attaboy Darren, a very impressive fish for sure !!  Looks like you've really got your boat rigged up nice for downrigging  too.
great catch bucktail.. too bad no sign! no worries, we'll get a better one
I missed my chance at a nice kicker fish for team 4 as well...nice fish regardless.
Thanks Guys  Lew... you dont get to see or smell it after a weekend of trolling worm harnesses on Erie!!  Yikes!
Nicely done, Darren!   I can hit Bronte in 30 mins....and I won't forget my sign  :D
Another nice Salmon for you Darren.  Good stuff, can't wait to get back out there myself
There's a good reason I don't ever use live bait Darren
Good job Darren Hopefully this weekend I can haul in a King for team 4
nice looking fish you got thair
See Darren,I have Simcoe and you have Lake O. Now were even.LOL  Nice fish bud. I want to get down there this year with the mrs,s.She would have a blast.
